description:
In the most recent podcast with Canadian lawyer Bruce Pardy and podcaster Konstantin Kisin, they discuss the potential problems with censoring speech — even speech you might find reprehensible. 

Watch the full episode here: https://youtu.be/gmuj5gDsxJI

Dr. Peterson's extensive catalog is available now on DailyWire+: https://bit.ly/3KrWbS8
